issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Opening this ticket to record/track information regarding the following Centos 5.7 Eucalyptus upgrade from 3.0.2 to 3.1
Has been reproducible so far using the described test env. Stopping all euca services, updating the repo, yum updating eucalytpus and then attempting to restart the euca related services. 


stdout at time of failure...



{code}
Starting Eucalyptus cluster controller: done.
Starting Eucalyptus services: Attempting database upgrade from 3.0.2 at /var/lib/eucalyptus/upgrade/eucalyptus.backup.1339481201...
#                           UPGRADE INFORMATION
#================================================================================
# Old Version:              3.0.2       
# New Version:              3.1.0       
# Upgrade keys:             false              using:                
# Upgrade configuration:    false              using:                
# Upgrade database:         true               using: upgrade_db     
# Same version:             false              using:                
# Start upgrading: db
Upgrading your database...
Mon Jun 11 23:20:11 2012 ERROR [com.eucalyptus.upgrade.StandalonePersistence.runDiscovery(StandalonePersistence.java):211] com.eucalyptus.scripting.ScriptExecutionFailedException: startup failed:
/etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/upgrade/upgrade_30_31.groovy: 146: unable to resolve class com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.BrokerVolumeInfo
 @ line 146, column 1.
   import com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.BrokerVolumeInfo;
   ^

 @ line 145, column 1.
   import com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.BrokerGroupInfo;
   ^

 @ line 148, column 1.
   import com.eucalyptus.broker.vmware.VMwareBrokerConfiguration;
   ^

/etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/upgrade/upgrade_30_31.groovy: 147: unable to resolve class com.eucalyptus.broker.vmware.VMwareBrokerInfo
 @ line 147, column 1.
   import com.eucalyptus.broker.vmware.VMwareBrokerInfo;
   ^

4 errors

/etc/eucalyptus/cloud.d/upgrade/upgrade_30_31.groovy: 146: unable to resolve class com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.BrokerVolumeInfo
 @ line 146, column 1.

fields.environment:
{code}
TEST_SEQ	build-n-conf-eee-01
NETWORK	MANAGED
GIT_REPO	git+ssh://repo-euca@git.eucalyptus-systems.com/internal
GIT_HASH	ef581143d5cb2047115dc43e3af3687d7b925806

CENTOS	5.7	64	REPO	[CC00 CLC SC00 WS]
CENTOS	5.7	64	REPO	[NC00]

MEMO
CLOUD_OPTS=--debug --log-level=EXTREME

USE_CUSTOM_BOTO=http://qa-server/4qa/4_euca2ools/deps/boto-new-latest.tar.gz
USE_CUSTOM_EUCA2OOLS_FOR_NC=http://qa-server/4qa/4_euca2ools/deps/euca2ools-2.0-latest.tar.gz

LOCAL_PKG_REPO=http://192.168.7.65/qa-pkg-storage/qa-3.0-pkgbuild/latest-success/phase3/centos/5/x86_64/
EXTRA_REPO=runtime-deps http://mirror.eucalyptus/gholms/packaging/runtime-deps/centos/5/x86_64/
USE_EPEL_REPO=YES

USE_DEFAULT_JAVA_HOME=YES

SET_VNET_NETMASK=255.255.240.0

EBS_STORAGE_MANAGER=NO-SAN
SAN_PROVIDER=NO-SAN
DISABLE_ISCSI=Y

END_MEMO

{code}
